alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:56PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bolivar County through 900 PM CDT... At 755 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trusten Holder WMA, or 12 miles south of White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gunnison around 815 PM CDT. Rosedale around 820 PM CDT. Beulah around 830 PM CDT. Pace around 840 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
